channel.title: general on Cong's little blog
channel.description: Recent content in general on Cong's little blog

item.title: What is this blog about?
item.description: This is my fresh start to personal blogging. Back in 2012, I was a huge advocate for Adobe Flash despite Apple’s decision to exclude it from the OS’s and remote-controlled toys. So I started flashandrc.wordpress.com. After a while, my interests grew past Adobe Flash and remote-controlled helicopters, and evolved onto transcribing music that I like and making electronics. Soon, my blog became the go-to knowledge base for ThinkPad keyboards and Machinarium bossa nova guitar piece transcription.

item.title: What is this blog about?
item.description: This is my fresh start to personal blogging. Back in 2012, I was a huge advocate for Adobe Flash despite Apple’s decision to exclude it from the OS’s and remote-controlled toys. So I started flashandrc.wordpress.com. After a while, my interests grew past Adobe Flash and remote-controlled helicopters, and evolved onto transcribing music that I like and making electronics. Soon, my blog became the go-to knowledge base for ThinkPad keyboards and Machinarium bossa nova guitar piece transcription.
